txt.en: 'This is the watch-house for the Shirriffs of Brockenborings.'
'I like to sweep the front yard of the watch-house for the Shirriffs. Just doing my part.'
'Bounder Primstone does his duty, but he'll also buy a friendly round at The Plough and Stars.'
'The Bounders have been kept busy lately, especially along the Bounds Wall.'
